skills.title: App Development
skills.description: Flutter developer skilled in building cross-platform mobile applications. Passionate about creating user-friendly and high-performance apps with seamless UI/UX designs. Strong problem-solving abilities.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.description: Web developer specializing in React. Able to build responsive and dynamic web applications with a focus on performance and user experience. Skilled in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern web technologies.

skills.title: Git & Github
skills.description: Proficient developer  in Git and GitHub. Skilled in version control, branch management, and collaborative coding. Adept at resolving merge conflicts and optimizing workflows for efficient project management.

skills.title: Database & Management
skills.description: Skilled developer in DBMS. Proficient in SQL, database design, and performance optimization. Adept at managing data integrity and creating efficient, scalable database solutions.
